alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 630 PM MST... At 524 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southwest of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, or 22 miles north of Ajo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend and Gila Bend Auxiliary Field. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 96 and 126. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 4. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 31, and between mile markers 119 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
